result.reason: Connections are not working after migrating XML to a new Windows system, indicating a critical bug in handling connection file migration or deserialization.
result.approach: Investigate the XML connection loading, saving, and decryption processes to identify why migrated files are not working on a new system. This may involve examining version compatibility, encryption key handling, or deserialization logic for potential inconsistencies or errors during cross-system migration.
